title: Too many skins
body:
Am I the only one frustrated when the shop comes out? It consistently comes out, and I can't get anything because I have all skins, ward skins, emotes, chromas, save a few legacy ones like the golden ones and unobtainable skins. Is there any way there could be some benefit for when the shop comes out for people who have almost everything? Like put some of the legacy stuff we don't have in the shop or something?
{{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body: That was what the blue essence store was supposed to be before riot bastardized it.
It must suck to be rich.
